channel.title: 768mbs of RAM on VPS but only able to use 40 of it! HELP!
channel.description: I really do not know what to do. I have tried everything google has told me. I run my server with it saying to use 512mbs of the 768 and all I am getting is 45-50. I changed priority to high and still nothing. it is a windows 2003 server btw! Thanks!

item.title: 768mbs of RAM on VPS but only able to use 40 of it! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:6, topic:542309”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=661186.msg4421719#msg4421719 date=1398761605]

2014
windows server 2003

It’s supported until the middle of next year. I’ve heard we still have a few 2003 servers ourselves at work.
[/quote]

IMO Microsoft should have dropped Windows Server 2003 when they stopped supporting XP[/quote]
No. Windows Server 2003 is being used quiet frequently by businesses. It’s the reason some people haven’t switched to Linux yet imo.

Read full topic

Anyways, post the code for the .bat file that runs your server, thanks.
